programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Drop the Mic

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Bae Watch

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Shock to the System
programme.desc: Boot camp couples reveal shocking and painful truths; Styles P reaches a breaking point with wife Adjua; Michel'le comes clean, forcing Stew to question their entire relationship.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Dirty Little Secrets

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Boot Camp Betrayal

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: The Naked Truth
programme.desc: The boot campers spill shocking sex secrets and intimacy issues are exposed; Joseline breaks down in a dramatic custody battle for her daughter; weakest couple questions their future; affair resurfaces that could tear a relationship apart.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Scarred Pasts
programme.desc: The campers divulge surprising traumas when they have to confront their childhood scars; Michelle struggles to face her past and wonders about her rocky relationship with Stew.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Love the Way You Lie
programme.desc: The boot campers face their biggest test of all, the lie detector and a fight erupts when Joseline shares a secret and Balistic breaks down; Dr. Ish and Judge Toler show shocking deception; the couples' hall pass leads to huge temptation.

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Put a Ring on It

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Electing to Face the Music
programme.desc: Five hip-hop couples enter Boot Camp and expose shocking secrets; Dr. Ish and Judge Toler push the campers to face their biggest issues in a heated debate; an explosive fight erupts and flips the house upside-down.

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Drama Said Knock You Out

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Swap It Like It's Hot
programme.desc: Jealousy strikes when the Boot Campers break out their sexiest dance moves; an explosive fight rocks the house, pushing Judge Toler to erupt in disappointment; a shocking health scare threatens a couple.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Pod Clash
programme.desc: The couples are divided during a podcast when Clinton Sparks gets the Boot Campers to open up about their partners; Tahiry learns a dark secret about Vado; tempers flare when Hazel-E thinks De'von is only in it for the clout.

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Hard Shock Life
programme.desc: Boot campers battle with communication issues; Willie's surprising confession stuns Shanda; Vado's shocking meltdown turns the house upside down.

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Luv Ya Self

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Talk Dirty to Me
programme.desc: The Boot Campers spill their shocking sex secrets & flip the house upside down; Dr. Ish's decision stuns the couples; Kurupt's behavior pushes Toni to a breaking point; hospital trip results in a devastating discovery.

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Break the Cycle
programme.desc: The Boot Campers confront their past and expose shocking childhood traumas; Tahiry struggles with Vado's return to the house; when Kurupt reaches a breaking point, Dr. Ish and Judge Toler make a difficult decision.

programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Truth Hurts
programme.desc: The lie detector test sparks chaos and threatens to tear the couples apart; Dr. Ish grants hall passes for a night at the club; one boot camper spirals out of control.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Vow or Never
programme.desc: The lie detector results wreak havoc on the house; a fight erupts before couples are forced to make their final decisions; Tahiry surprises Vado with a powerful revelation.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Lovers on Lockdown
programme.desc: Four new couples enter the Boot Camp house and identify the problems plaguing their relationships.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Rap Battle
programme.desc: The couples defend themselves in a rap battle to address their resentments; N.O.R.E. drops a bomb on Neri during a drill; Tuff refuses to take accountability for his past; Tresure's drinking causes trouble and leads to an explosive end of the night.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Public Enemies
programme.desc: The couples confront how the public perceives them and how they see each other; Monie and Amber reveal unexpected truths and Tresure is challenged by Judge Toler to change her behavior and show the boot campers and the world her true self.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Drop It Like It's T.H.O.T.
programme.desc: The couples swap partners to perform a sexy dance for a music video, but jealousy sparks drama; N.O.R.E is brought to tears when Dr. Ish drops a truth bomb; Toler is shocked when the boot campers question the exercise.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Speak of the Devil
programme.desc: Hip-hop couples compete in a race; communication drills spark drama when one boot camper threatens to leave; N.O.R.E.'s temper flares when he loses control; Tresure breaks down, spiraling Mally into chaos.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: High on Mally
programme.desc: It's sex day and the couples open up about their sex lives; Monie and Tuff have a major breakthrough; one couple reveals a massive secret that is so explosive, it turns the house upside down.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Diss-Respect
programme.desc: The couples must reenact their worst fights on Respect Day; an unwelcome surprise shocks the boot campers; Monie Love breaks down when forced to confront her painful past with Tuff.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Breaking the Cycle
programme.desc: In order to understand how they behave in their current relationships, the boot-campers explore their formative years and how those experiences shaped them as adults today; emotions run high when past traumas are confronted head on.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: All Lies On Me
programme.desc: The couples take a lie detector test to determine whether they're being truthful to their partners about the core issue in their relationship; drama erupts when they learn that, for the first time in history, at least one person lied in each couple.

programme.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
programme.sub-title: Hip Hop Edition: Put a Ring On It?
programme.desc: The last day of boot camp and the ultimate decision of whether to leave together or apart; at least one person in each couple is not keeping it 100 and the truth is finally revealed.
